summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the condemnation proceedings to acquire such property rights as may be necessary for an existing Monorail System in 4th Avenue North, Thomas Street, 5th Avenue North, Denny Way, 5th Avenue, Westlake Avenue and Pine Street, including the terminal and escalator access thereto and an aerial easement at the corner of 5th Avenue North and Denny Way under Ordinance 93917, King County Cause No. 642136, accepting a condemnation award (Parcel 64) and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund for payment therefor.
